resources.string: Internal error: problems with the database query. Call admin 111–111–111 to check problem
Cursor is null or cursor out of bound while getting persons with LIMIT
Cursor is null or no such person while getting person with ID
Cursor is null or no courses for person while getting courses person with ID
Error while deleting rows from table
Error : no course with such name %1$s in the database
Error : while assign person with person_id %1$d to course with course_id %2$d in the database
